name: GhostHunt With Triggered Insaan
description:
A Horror Game Featuring Triggered Insaan (Nischay Malhan) as a Ghost Hunter. Explore the Environment, Find the Ghost, and Defeat Him to Escape.

Join Triggered Insaan in his new apartment for a heart-pounding horror game! Strange things start happening, and you must help him escape using ghost-hunting tools like the EMF reader and spirit box. Investigate, solve puzzles, and survive the paranormal. Can you unravel the mystery and make it out alive?

Be careful in Triggered Insaan's spooky apartment—there's a ghost around. Outsmart it to stay safe in this spooky adventure!

Ghost Hunting Tools -
• EMF Reader
• Spirit Box
• Summoning Circle
and more...

Features -
• High Graphics
• With Leaderboard
• Various Tools for Ghost Detection
• Emotes

Game Mode
• Easy - 5 lives but unranked
• Hard - 1 life and Ranked
